author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Remove and modify many more test scripts in Geometry/HGCalCommonData in view of retaining only stuffs for V16, V17 and TB

#### PR validation:

Tested the modified scripts locally. They are not part of any unit test or any production sequence

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx327G Remove and modify many more test scripts in Geometry/HGCalCommonData in view of retaining only stuffs for V16, V17 and TB
